message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Let's be reasonable and avoid inflation eating away at our potential gains.
Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  I'm proposing a more balanced split, understanding that inflation hurts you more than me.
Bob, my friend, you drive a hard bargain!  Let's settle this now - I'll accept a slight reduction from my original offer.  This is better than risking further inflation.
